程序包 com.iohao.game.widget.light.room.operation

类 OperationContext

java.lang.Object
com.iohao.game.widget.light.room.operation.OperationContext
所有已实现的接口:
DomainEventSource, Eo, Topic, PlayerOperationContext
public class OperationContext extends Object implements PlayerOperationContext, Eo
玩家玩法操作上下文 

 // 创建玩法操作上下文
 OperationContext operationContext = OperationContext.of(room, operationHandler)
     // 当前操作的玩家
     .setFlowContext(flowContext)
     // 开发者根据游戏业务定制的操作数据
     .setCommand(command);
 // 执行玩法操作
 operationContext.execute();
